title: Who Will Be at Vulture Festival 2019
text:
Photo: Vulture

Have you ever wanted to watch MacGruber with live commentary from Will Forte and John Solomon? Does the idea of couples from The Bachelor hosting a game night make you suddenly not hate the idea of a game night? Do you lay awake at night worrying about what the cast of Community has been up to? Yeah, us too! And that’s why all of that and more is coming to Vulture Festival LA Presented by AT&T. We’re bringing The Man In the High Castle to you live and in person (in a fun way, don’t worry.) If you feel like getting out and about, Adam Pally and Casey Wilson will be taking a busload of us for a tour of LA’s most glamorous locales, and after all that you can get a front row seat to watch David Chang do an eating demonstration. But while building out your schedule, don’t forget to make time for the Party Down reunion and dinner with the One Day at a Time family. Did they invent the word “FOMO” to specifically describe what happens to people who miss Vulture Festival? That’s impossible to know, but it’s likely.

Get tickets now at VultureFestival.com!

TV A C o m m u n i t y R e u n i o n Attention students of Greendale, please report to Vulture Festival for a reunion of your favorite genre-redefining sitcom.

We’re getting the study group — including Joel McHale, Alison Brie, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Jim Rash, Yvette Nicole Brown, Ken Jeong, Chris McKenna, and Dan Harmon — back together to share notes on their time on the series, their favorite episodes, and if we will ever get that long-dreamed-about movie. Six seasons and a reunion!

TV A n E a t i n g D e m o n s t r a t i o n W i t h D a v i d C h a n g a n d a S p e c i a l G u e s t It will definitely be the tastiest event.

David Chang may be one of today’s greatest celebrity chefs, but, as he proves on Netflix’s Ugly Delicious and the upcoming Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner, he might be even better at eating. Chang comes to the Festival to turn it into his own personal Vulture feast, while talking about his favorite foods, the best dining experiences, and how a career in the kitchen compares to what his friends do all day.

TV C o u p l e s G a m e N i g h t w i t h B a c h e l o r N a t i o n While your normie friends are home playing Scrabble with the decidedly non-famous, we’ll be hanging with some of Bachelor Nation’s brightest and most competitive stars.

Ashley Iaconetti and Jared Haibon, Jade Roper-Tolbert and Tanner Tolbert, Katie Morton and Chris Bukowski, and Cassie Randolph and Colton Underwood enjoy a night in (at Vulture Festival), playing all sorts of party, board, and dating games.

TV T h e M a n i n t h e H i g h C a s t l e V i s i t s O u r R e a l i t y In this world, you’re presented with the opportunity to attend Vulture Festival along with the cast and creators of Amazon Prime Video’s The Man in the High Castle.

Join cast members Rufus Sewell, Jason O’Mara, Chelah Horsdal, Joel de la Fuente, and Frances Turner, along with executive producers Isa Dick Hackett and David Scarpa, for a conversation about what brings this complex, nuanced tale to life and a special sneak peek at what’s to come in the exciting conclusion of the series in season four.

Fun A S t a r T o u r W i t h A d a m P a l l y & C a s e y W i l s o n Los Angeles is a city of stars, so who better to show you around than two of our favorite celebrities, Adam Pally and Casey Wilson?

Join them on a bus tour of all the most glamorous places that also happen to be easily accessible in L.A. traffic at 4 p.m. on a Sunday. See the City of Angels through their eyes, and then they’ll see you safely back to the Hollywood Roosevelt for a drink in the Vulture Lounge following the tour. Bon voyage.

Movies Shut your butt! MacGruber is coming to Vulture Festival!

Join us for a screening of this modern comedy classic, with MacGruber himself Will Forte and co-writer John Solomon providing live commentary throughout. You will laugh, you might cry, you will definitely see someone’s throat get ripped out.
description: NBC’s Community is reuniting at Vulture Festival, and The Bachelor, The Man In the High Castle, MacGruber, David Chang, and an Adam Pally and Casey Wilson tour of LA are also happening.
